Oops forgot to give the name and ISBN:

shiyanhai (Shanghai) taimakou shinsengumi ibun roguin te buru to ku a 
rupi ji shiri zu

ISBN : 4757714114 

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <wounds@s...> wrote:
> In updating the description on some of the books in the 
ShinsengumiDB 
> I found this...
> 
> This is probably one of the most bizzare writings/works that I have 
> come across dealing with the Shinsengumi. I believe it is a novel 
and 
> that the setting is in China, Shanghai to be exact. The characters 
> are historic men like Okita Soji, Ryoma Sakamato, etc. What makes 
> this bizzare is that it is a romance novel with "guest" stars like 
> Dracula, Sherlock Holmes, Billy the Kid, etc.... Oh it also 
> incorporates elements from every country including Russia???
> 
> If anyone has this book PLEASE let me know the gist of it! Thanks.
> 
> Japanese Language
> 
> Release Date : April 30, 2003
